document_data.mainbody:
Barrit was a scholar and wizard who lived in Tilverton circa 1369 DR. He performed research for the Puppetmasters adventuring company, and located Barrenstone for them, the lost underground home of Adzerak the lich.
His home was two buildings north-west of the Whispering Witch inn, and he was good friends with the ruling Rowanmantle family.
